snp1.8:6.3: mahantā → ye mahantā vā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mahanta (?)
snp1.8:7.1: adiṭṭhā → addiṭṭhā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | adiṭṭha (?), va → ye ca (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp1.8:7.3: Bhūtā va sambhavesī va → bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
snp1.8:8.2: na kañci → naṃ kañci (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | naṃ kiñci (sya-all) | na kiñci (mr)
